cause.description:
Millions around the world are hungry, leading to thousands of deaths daily. Genetically modified organisms offer potential relief in many forms, ranging from better growing in harsh or arid climates to increased nutritional value. Put simply, this breakthrough technology could improve the quality of millions of lives. The process used is simply a more advanced version of the crop hybridization techniques that have been utilized to improve food quality for thousands of years. Consequently, we support the use of GMOs, and oppose efforts to withhold their benefits from the world’s people.
1. Genetically modified organisms ought to be used broadly.
cause.mission: To alleviate global hunger through the proliferation of genetically modified organisms (GMOs).
cause.name: Support Genetically Modified Crops
